name: Monster Control
description:
Game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme Out of Control.

Try to make sure no monster go extinct in this weird management game.

Apparently playing again after a loss is bugged and I wasn't able to fix in time. So yeah, that happened.

This game was made by Julick Coutinho.

All Sounds and the Font are under the Creative Commons license.
